params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.parent
params.description: Required. The resource name of the parent lake: projects/{project_number}/locations/{location_id}/lakes/{lake_id}.

params.name: data.zone_id
params.description: Required. Zone identifier. This ID will be used to generate names such as database and dataset names when publishing metadata to Hive Metastore and BigQuery. Must contain only lowercase letters, numbers and hyphens. Must start with a letter. Must end with a number or a letter. Must be between 1-63 characters. Must be unique across all lakes from all locations in a project. Must not be one of the reserved IDs (i.e. "default", "global-temp")

params.name: data.validate_only
params.description: Optional. Only validate the request, but do not perform mutations. The default is false.

params.name: var
params.description: Required. The resource name of the parent lake: projects/{project_number}/locations/{location_id}/lakes/{lake_id}.

methods.name: getZoneId
methods.description:
Required. Zone identifier.

This ID will be used to generate names such as database and dataset names when publishing metadata to Hive Metastore and BigQuery.

  • Must contain only lowercase letters, numbers and hyphens.
  • Must start with a letter.
  • Must end with a number or a letter.
  • Must be between 1-63 characters.
  • Must be unique across all lakes from all locations in a project.
  • Must not be one of the reserved IDs (i.e. "default", "global-temp")

Generated from protobuf field string zone_id = 2 [(.google.api.field_behavior) = REQUIRED];
